title: League Won't Open (Mac)
body: Whenever I go to launch League the icon just bounces a few times then starts to not respond, is their any way I can fix this without having to uninstall and reinstall?

replies.body: In case anyone else comes here (cuz I was having the same issue), there was a mac update I needed to do that restarted my computer and everything worked after that :)

This can happen if your connection is struggling to reach the patching server, and can't launch.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
